objectives: Cut cradle-to-gate emissions for the top three SKUs by 15% within 12 months
Increase use of recycled or certified low-carbon materials to 40% of total volume
Standardize supplier sustainability scorecards across the top five vendors
success_metrics: kg CO2e per unit reduction tracked monthly
Percentage of qualified suppliers meeting renewable energy targets
Reduction in scrap or rework rates linked to material substitutions

stakeholders.focus: Portfolio-level emissions trajectory and regulatory readiness
Supplier engagement, contract updates, and cost controls
Process qualifications, throughput, and quality assurance

constraints: Avoid >5% increase in unit cost without a defined payback
Maintain existing production takt times during pilot phases
Document chain-of-custody for all new materials
